name: Tip The Cow
overview:
Provider of web solutions focused on generating revenue through multiple streams of income across various market sectors.

Fusing technology with proven marketing strategies, Tip The Cow LLC website entities are designed to maximize revenue with a minimal commitment to time investment.

The ideas are simple. Create autonomous web enterprises that are auto-updating and self-servicing while minimizing the impact of market changes. Through various streams of marketing revenue, including affiliate income, advertising income, and direct sales income, Tip The Cow LLC enterprises are designed for profitability by providing customers with high quality content and services.
